title: Bitcoin Mining Activity Surges as Difficulty Soars to New Peak
description: With about six and a half months until the next halving event, Bitcoin’s mining difficulty level has just hit a new all-time high.

title: $200 million in Bitcoin leaves exchanges amid ETF hearsay
description:
Quick Take Over the course of Oct. 16, a total of 7,000 Bitcoin, worth roughly $200 million, vacated exchanges. While some movement may be in response to a recent wave of misinformation regarding the approval of a Bitcoin spot ETF, the flurry of on-chain has persisted both before and after. This movement was accompanied by […]

The post $200 million in Bitcoin leaves exchanges amid ETF hearsay appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Lido sunsets Solana staking due to lack of funds; halts deposits effective immediately
description:
Decentralized finance staking service provider Lido (LDO) is winding down its Solana (SOL) staking product today, Oct. 16, because it lacks funds to sustain the project, according to a blog statement from its team. The team revealed that it came to this decision after an extensive DAO forum discussion and a community vote that favored […]

The post Lido sunsets Solana staking due to lack of funds; halts deposits effective immediately appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Wipe Out — Fake SEC Approval Report Erases $71M in Bitcoin Short Positions
description: In the wake of fabricated news asserting the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) green-lit Blackrock’s Ishares spot bitcoin exchange-traded fund, short positions worth $78.92 million were cleared out. This sum represented 57% of the overall $136.29 million in short positions erased in the last 24 hours. Misleading Report on SEC Decision Shakes Bitcoin Market, […]

title: Ethereum Price Prediction 2023-2032: Will ETH reach $8000 soon?
description: Ethereum Price Prediction 2023-2032 “The Merge did not change anything for holders/users.” Is that a fact? Crypto prices are unlikely to see a major recovery without new or returning investors bringing cash back into the market. Unless the retail people enter the market, Ethereum won’t strongly blast above ATH. Maybe something sparks retail, though, like Coinbase, ... Read more

title: Manta Network transitions to Polygon CDK
description: Manta Network has unveiled its strategic decision to adopt the Polygon Chain Development Kit for the network's future development.

title: US Government Owns 200,000 Bitcoins Worth Billions of Dollars to Combat Inflation
description: The WSJ has revealed that the U.S. government is one of the largest holders of Bitcoin (BTC) with billions worth held in their addresses. Unlike most holders, the government has little interest in whether the price goes up or down. Through some high-profile busts of cyber criminals and unscrupulous platforms being taken down by authorities, [...]

title: TangleSwap and IOTA Forge a Path to Interoperable DeFi on Cardano
description: TangleSwap, an IOTA-backed DEX has gone live on the Cardano blockchain. TangleSwap introduces a new revenue stream into both the Cardano and IOTA ecosystems, ensuring balanced and sustainable token emissions. In a recent development, two prominent blockchain projects, TangleSwap and IOTA, have teamed up to lay the groundwork for interoperable Decentralized Finance (DeFi) on the [...]

title: The Top Performing Cryptocurrencies of Q3 2023
description:
BCH, XMR, ETC, FIL, and APT are among the best-performing cryptocurrencies in the third quarter of 2023. In a recent report, Kaiko, the crypto asset data-providing platform, revealed that the price of BCH nearly tripled at the start of July, helping to boost volumes and liquidity. Kaiko’s recent report covered various metrics and spread across […]

The post The Top Performing Cryptocurrencies of Q3 2023 appeared first on Coin Edition.
